verses.verse: Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to his anointed <S%H4899><s%>, to Cyrus <S%H3566><s%>, whose right hand <S%H3225><s%> I have held <S%H2388><s%>, to subdue <S%H7286><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him <S%H6605><s%>; and I will loose the body <S%H4975><s%> of kings <S%H4428><s%>, to open <S%H6605><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him the two leaved gates <S%H1817><s%>; and the gates <S%H8179><s%> shall not be shut <S%H5462><s%>;

I will go <S%H3212><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you <S%H3474><s%>, and make the crooked places <S%H1921><s%> straight <S%H3474><s%>: I will break in pieces <S%H7665><s%> the gates <S%H1817><s%> of brass <S%H5154><s%>, and cut in pieces <S%H1438><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> of iron <S%H1270><s%>:

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> you the treasures <S%H214><s%> of darkness <S%H2822><s%>, and hidden riches <S%H4301><s%> of secret places <S%H4565><s%>, that you may know <S%H3045><s%> that I <S%H3068><s%>, the Lord, which call <S%H7121><s%> you by your name <S%H8034><s%>, am the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

For Jacob <S%H3290><s%> my servant <S%H5650><s%>'s sake <S%H3478><s%>, and Israel my elect <S%H972><s%>, I have even called <S%H7121><s%> you by your name <S%H8034><s%>: I have surnamed <S%H3655><s%> you <S%H3045><s%>, though you have not known me.
I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and there is none else <S%H430><s%>, there is no God beside <S%H2108><s%> me <S%H247><s%>: I girded you <S%H3045><s%>, though you have not known me:

That they may know <S%H3045><s%> from the rising <S%H4217><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%>, and from the west <S%H4628><s%>, that there is none <S%H657><s%> beside <S%H1107><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>. I am the Lord, and there is none else.

I form <S%H3335><s%> the light <S%H216><s%>, and create <S%H1254><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%>: I make <S%H6213><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%>, and create <S%H1254><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%>: I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> do all these things <S%H6213><s%>.

Drop down <S%H7491><s%>, you heavens <S%H8064><s%>, from above <S%H4605><s%>, and let the skies <S%H7834><s%> pour down <S%H5140><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%>: let the earth <S%H776><s%> open <S%H6605><s%>, and let them bring forth <S%H6509><s%> salvation <S%H3468><s%>, and let righteousness <S%H6666><s%> spring up <S%H6779><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>; I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> have created it <S%H1254><s%>.

Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto him that strives <S%H7378><s%> with his Maker <S%H3335><s%>! Let the potsherd <S%H2789><s%> argue with the potsherds <S%H2789><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>. Shall the clay <S%H2563><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to him that fashions <S%H3335><s%> it <S%H6213><s%>, What make you <S%H6467><s%>? or your work, He has no hands <S%H3027><s%>?
Woe <S%H1945><s%> unto him that says <S%H559><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%>, What fathered <S%H3205><s%> you <S%H802><s%>? or to the woman, What have you brought forth <S%H2342><s%>?

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and his Maker <S%H3335><s%>, Ask <S%H7592><s%> me of things to come <S%H857><s%> concerning my sons <S%H1121><s%>, and concerning the work <S%H6467><s%> of my hands <S%H3027><s%> command you me <S%H6680><s%>.

I have made <S%H6213><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, and created <S%H1254><s%> man <S%H120><s%> upon it <S%H3027><s%>: I, even my hands, have stretched out <S%H5186><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, and all their army <S%H6635><s%> have I commanded <S%H6680><s%>.

I have raised him up <S%H5782><s%> in righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and I will direct <S%H3474><s%> all his ways <S%H1870><s%>: he shall build <S%H1129><s%> my city <S%H5892><s%>, and he shall let go <S%H7971><s%> my captives <S%H1546><s%>, not for price <S%H4242><s%> nor reward <S%H7810><s%>, says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, The labor <S%H3018><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, and merchandise <S%H5505><s%> of Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%> and of the Sabeans <S%H5436><s%>, men <S%H582><s%> of stature <S%H4060><s%>, shall come over <S%H5674><s%> unto you <S%H3212><s%>, and they shall be your: they shall come after <S%H310><s%> you <S%H2131><s%>; in chains they shall come over <S%H5674><s%>, and they shall fall down <S%H7812><s%> unto you <S%H6419><s%>, they shall make supplication unto you <S%H410><s%>, saying, Surely God is in you <S%H657><s%>; and there is none else, there is no God <S%H430><s%>.
Truly <S%H403><s%> you are a God <S%H410><s%> that hide <S%H5641><s%> yourself <S%H430><s%>, O God of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, the Savior <S%H3467><s%>.

They shall be ashamed <S%H954><s%>, and also confounded <S%H3637><s%>, all of them <S%H1980><s%>: they shall go to confusion <S%H3639><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> that are makers <S%H2796><s%> of idols <S%H6736><s%>.

But Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall be saved <S%H3467><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with a everlasting <S%H5769><s%> salvation <S%H8668><s%>: you shall not be ashamed <S%H954><s%> nor confounded <S%H3637><s%> world <S%H5769><s%> without end <S%H5703><s%>.

For thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> that created <S%H1254><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%>; God <S%H430><s%> himself that formed <S%H3335><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> and made <S%H6213><s%> it <S%H3559><s%>; he has established it <S%H1254><s%>, he created it not void <S%H8414><s%>, he formed <S%H3335><s%> it to be inhabited <S%H3427><s%>: I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; and there is none else.

I have not spoken <S%H1696><s%> in secret <S%H5643><s%>, in a dark <S%H2822><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: I said <S%H559><s%> not unto the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, Seek <S%H1245><s%> you me in vain <S%H8414><s%>: I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, I declare <S%H5046><s%> things that are right <S%H4339><s%>.

Assemble <S%H6908><s%> yourselves and come <S%H935><s%>; draw near <S%H5066><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, you that are escaped <S%H6412><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>: they have no knowledge <S%H3045><s%> that set up <S%H5375><s%> the wood <S%H6086><s%> of their engraved image <S%H6459><s%>, and pray <S%H6419><s%> unto a god <S%H410><s%> that cannot save <S%H3467><s%>.

Tell <S%H5046><s%> you <S%H5066><s%>, and bring them near; Yes <S%H3289><s%>, let them take counsel together <S%H3162><s%>: who has declared <S%H8085><s%> this from ancient time <S%H6924><s%>? who has told <S%H5046><s%> it from that time <S%H3068><s%>? have not I the Lord? and there is no God <S%H430><s%> else beside <S%H1107><s%> me <S%H6662><s%>; a just God <S%H410><s%> and a Savior <S%H3467><s%>; there is none <S%H369><s%> beside me <S%H2108><s%>.
Look <S%H6437><s%> unto me <S%H3467><s%>, and be you saved, all the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>: for I am God <S%H410><s%>, and there is none else.

I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> by myself <S%H1697><s%>, the word is gone out <S%H3318><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%> in righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, and shall not return <S%H7725><s%>, That unto me every knee <S%H1290><s%> shall bow <S%H3766><s%>, every tongue <S%H3956><s%> shall swear <S%H7650><s%>.

Surely <S%H559><s%>, shall one say, in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> have I righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and strength <S%H5797><s%>: even to him shall men come <S%H935><s%>; and all that are incensed <S%H2734><s%> against him shall be ashamed <S%H954><s%>.
In the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall all the seed <S%H2233><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> be justified <S%H6663><s%>, and shall glory <S%H1984><s%>.
